reviewText: This is an oldie but goodie. Good old,vintage yule time classic with two of the original kings of comedy,the immortal ABBOTT AND COSTELLO. The christmas skits are very funny and you also get to see some old time tv commercials. There is also plenty of bonus material on the disc i got.Its advertized at 117 minutes but goes way past that. If you want some good ole christmas time entertainment then i highly reccommend getting this. Also,no true Abbott and Costello fan should be without this.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Let me preface this review: I love A&C; movies. Love them. So why the bad review?The quality of this dvd is poor. There is little enhancement to the audio or visual aspects, but, mostly, the description of this dvd is misleading.This special was merely the Christmas timed version of the Colgate Comedy Hour. Not all the skits are A & C and those that are aren't all that holiday centric. In fact, most have no reference to hte holidays. The music aspects of this "special" aren't holiday based either.I don't have much to reference, but I would have expected something much more of the content revolved around Christmas if it was truly a Christmas Special.In my opinion, it wasn't even worth the $2 I spent for it, as I will never watch it again.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is still Abbott & Costello at their finest.Abbott and Costello Christmas Special
Title: N/A

reviewText: What memories!  I was little guy when Colgate sponsored the Abbott & Costello Show and this two episode gem highlights the talents of this comedy duo.  The first hour episode is the Christmas special (wait 'til you hear the awesome voice of Margaret Whiting).  The second is a random episode that is simply hilarious (wait 'til you see the snake woman).  5 stars.  The best part is that many of the skits contain lots of pushing, shoving and falling down.  No stunt people here.  Bud and Lou do it all by themselves.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Recieved the DVD in very good condition and in a very resonable amount of time. Abbott and Costillo are the funnest team around next to Laurel and Hardy. Would recommend to anyone who likes Abbott and Costillo.
